name: Dear Diary (itch) (hahajace)
description:
Our Game:

Dear Diary is a single-player open-world adventure game. Taking on the role of Chloe, embark on a journey of exploration and discovery led by a collection of diary entries, where you will learn about the pathetic story between Chloe and her parents......

Would you be able to put all the fractured memories together?

Our Team:

  • Xiaoyao Ren - Director, Assets Artist
  • Hanqi Ding - Assets Artist, Project Manager
  • Clarissa Leyi Li - Programmer, Assets Artist
  • Yihao Heliu - Programmer, Level Designer
  • Junyu Gao - Programmer, Sound
